00016 void eol_config_init()
00017 {
00018   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: initializing\n");
00019   _eol_config_initialized = eolTrue;
00020   atexit(eol_config_deinit);
00021   eol_logger_load_config();
00022   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: initialized\n");
00023 }
00024 
00025 void eol_config_deinit(void)
00026 {
00027   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: closing\n");
00028   _eol_config_initialized = eolFalse;
00029   eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: closed\n");
00030 }

00032 eolConfig *eol_config_load(char* filename)
00033 {
00034   yaml_parser_t parser;
00035   FILE *input;
00036   eolConfig *config;
00037   
00038   if(!yaml_parser_initialize(&parser))
00039   {
00040     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Failed to initialize yaml parser\n");
00041     return NULL;
00042   }
00043   
00044   config = malloc(sizeof(eolConfig));
00045   if (config == NULL)
00046   {
00047     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Unable to allocate config!\n");
00048     return NULL;
00049   }
00050   
00051   eol_line_cpy(config->filename, filename);
00052   config->_node = eol_keychain_new_hash();
00053   if(config->_node == NULL)
00054   {
00055     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Unable to allocate keychain for config\n");
00056     return NULL;
00057   }
00058   input = fopen(filename, "r");
00059   if(input == NULL)
00060   {
00061     eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "eol_config: Can't open config file %s\n", filename );
00062     return NULL;
00063   }
00064   yaml_parser_set_input_file(&parser, input);
00065 
00066   eol_config_parse_tier(&parser, config->_node);
00067 
00068   yaml_parser_delete(&parser);
00069   fclose(input);
00070   return config;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void eol_config_destroy(eolConfig *config)
00074 {
00075   if (!config)return;
00076   eol_keychain_destroy(config->_node);
00077   free(config);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void eol_config_free(eolConfig **config)
00081 {
00082   if (!config)return;
00083   if (!*config)return;
00084   eol_config_destroy(*config);
00085   *config = NULL;
00086 }

00088 void eol_config_parse_sequence(yaml_parser_t *parser, eolKeychain *chain)
00089 {
00090   int done = 0;
00091   eolKeychain *next = NULL;
00092   yaml_event_t event;
00093   /* First element must be a variable, or we'll change states to SEQ */
00094   int state = KEY;
00095   do
00096   {
00097     yaml_parser_parse(parser, &event);
00098     switch(event.type)
00099     {
00100       case YAML_MAPPING_START_EVENT:
00101         next = eol_keychain_new_hash();
00102         eol_keychain_list_append(chain,next);
00103         state ^= VAL;
00104         eol_config_parse_tier(parser, next);
00105         break;
00106       case YAML_SEQUENCE_END_EVENT:
00107       case YAML_MAPPING_END_EVENT:
00108       case YAML_STREAM_END_EVENT:
00109         done = 1;
00110         /* terminate the while loop, see below */
00111         break;
00112       default:
00113         eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "unhandled YAML event %d\n", event.type);
00114     }
00115     if(parser->error != YAML_NO_ERROR)
00116     {
00117       eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "yaml_error_type_e %d: %s %s at (line: %lu, col: %lu)\n",
00118                           parser->error, parser->context, parser->problem, parser->problem_mark.line,
00119                           parser->problem_mark.column);
00120                           return;
00121     }
00122     yaml_event_delete(&event);
00123   }while (!done);
00124 }
00125 
00126 void eol_config_parse_tier(yaml_parser_t *parser, eolKeychain *chain)
00127 {
00128   int done = 0;
00129   eolLine last_key;
00130   eolKeychain *next = NULL;
00131   yaml_event_t event;
00132   /* First element must be a variable, or we'll change states to SEQ */
00133   int state = KEY;
00134   eol_line_cpy(last_key,"");
00135   do
00136   {
00137     yaml_parser_parse(parser, &event);
00138     switch(event.type)
00139     {
00140       case YAML_SCALAR_EVENT:
00141         if (state == KEY)
00142         {
00143           /* new key, hold on to it until we get a value as well */
00144           eol_line_cpy(last_key,(char *)event.data.scalar.value);
00145         }
00146         else
00147         {
00148           /* state is VAL or SEQ */
00149           /* TODO data type logic should go here */
00150           eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "eol_config: adding key -> value (%s -> %s)\n", last_key, event.data.scalar.value);
00151           next = eol_keychain_new_string((char *)event.data.scalar.value);
00152           eol_keychain_hash_insert(chain,last_key,next);
00153         }
00154         state ^= VAL; /* Toggles KEY/VAL, avoids touching SEQ */
00155         break;
00156       case YAML_SEQUENCE_START_EVENT:
00157         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_config: adding sequence %s...\n",last_key);
00158         next = eol_keychain_new_list();
00159         eol_keychain_hash_insert(chain,last_key,
00160                                  next);
00161         eol_config_parse_sequence(parser, next);
00162         break;
00163       case YAML_MAPPING_START_EVENT:
00164         if (strlen(last_key) == 0)break;/*first level is implied hash.*/
00165         eol_logger_message(EOL_LOG_INFO,"eol_config: adding hash %s...\n",last_key);
00166         next = eol_keychain_new_hash();
00167         eol_keychain_hash_insert(chain,last_key,next);
00168         state ^= VAL;
00169         eol_config_parse_tier(parser, next);
00170         break;
00171       case YAML_MAPPING_END_EVENT:
00172       case YAML_STREAM_END_EVENT:
00173       case YAML_SEQUENCE_END_EVENT:
00174         done = 1;
00175         /* terminate the while loop, see below */
00176         break;
00177       default:
00178         eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_INFO, "unhandled YAML event %d\n", event.type);
00179     }
00180     if(parser->error != YAML_NO_ERROR)
00181     {
00182       eol_logger_message( EOL_LOG_ERROR, "yaml_error_type_e %d: %s %s at (line: %lu, col: %lu)\n",
00183                           parser->error, parser->context, parser->problem, parser->problem_mark.line,
00184                           parser->problem_mark.column);
00185                           return;
00186     }
00187     yaml_event_delete(&event);
00188   }
00189   while (!done);
00190 }

00192 eolBool eol_config_get_keychain(eolKeychain *output,
00193                                 eolConfig *conf)
00194 {
00195   g_return_val_if_fail(conf->_node, eolFalse);
00196   g_return_val_if_fail(output, eolFalse);
00197   output = conf->_node;
00198   return eolTrue;
00199 }
00200 
00201 eolBool eol_config_get_keychain_by_tag(eolKeychain **output,
00202                                        eolConfig *conf,
00203                                        eolLine tag)
00204 {
00205   g_return_val_if_fail(conf->_node, eolFalse);
00206   g_return_val_if_fail(output, eolFalse);
00207   *output = eol_keychain_get_hash_value(conf->_node, tag);
00208   if (*output == NULL)return eolFalse;
00209   return eolTrue;
00210 }
